channel.title: The Studs Terkel Radio Archive
channel.description: The WFMT Radio Network, along with the Studs Terkel Center for Oral History of the Chicago History Museum and many other committed partners, are working toward turning this site into the first-ever, comprehensive online Studs Terkel Radio Archive.
channel.itunes:author: Studs Terkel
